meanings.definition: Rutabagas: a root vegetable similar to a turnip
meanings.sent1: I planted rutabagas in my garden last spring.
meanings.sent2: The farmer harvested a basket full of rutabagas.
meanings.sent3: Why did the rutabaga refuse to play hide and seek? Because it was a terrible root vegetable!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as a freshly picked rutabaga.
meanings.sent5: The earthy aroma of rutabagas filled the kitchen.

meanings.definition: Rutabagas: the plural form of rutabaga
meanings.sent1: We bought two rutabagas from the grocery store.
meanings.sent2: The recipe called for a cup of diced rutabagas.
meanings.sent3: The rutabagas at the market were having a dance party in the produce section.
meanings.sent4: The rutabagas in the soup added a unique flavor to the dish.
meanings.sent5: The rutabagas rolled off the table and onto the floor, creating a mess.
